name: Crazy Roundabout
description:
Goal: Survive in the crazy roundabout while the car crash in the exit get cleaned up.

Control: wasd, keyboard arrows or controller left analog stick. Esc will bring you back to the menu.

Music: “Metalmania”, “Too Cool” Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
